```{r, eval = TRUE}

# Define function to install or load packages
load_packages <- function(x) {
  y <- x %in% rownames(installed.packages())
  if(any(!y)) install.packages(x[!y])
  invisible(lapply(x, library, character.only=T))
  rm(x, y)
}

# Load required packagess
load_packages(c(
    "tidyverse",
    "here",
    "DBI",
    "RSQLite",
    "httr"
    ))

```
